roleset.name: think about

example.name: transitive
example.text: And with the company's recent announcement that it is contemplating a partial sale of its real estate, the values suddenly look poorer.
example.arg: a partial sale of its real estate

example.name: with attribute
example.text: John contemplated stalking Mary as a sign of his devotion.
example.arg: as a sign of his devotion

roleset.note: Based on financial subcorpus; nominal 'contemplation' based on BOLT-6. No Verbnet entry. Comparison to think (about).

example.name: nominal rel: contemplation
example.text: I believe this is definitely something worthy of our serious contemplation .
